title: Mid Level Web Developer
description: We are looking to hire a mid-level developer full time to help develop sites on the Shopify platform. You will be working remotely alongside a designer to produce visually aesthetic, forward-thinking and effective front-end experiences. The job will require you to build sites from themes on Shopify, modify pre-existing themes, and build custom themes on the Shopify platform depending on the scope of the project. This person will also be leading A/B tests using Google Optimize and Convert and should have familiarity conducting A/B tests and reviewing results. You will most likely be balancing tasks on several clients at once, and will need to have strong time management, organizational, and communication skills. We prefer applicants to live in Austin or be willing to relocate.

title: Front-end WordPress Developer - job post
description: We are seeking a WordPress Developer responsible for both back-end and front-end development, including having an eye for clean and artful web design. You should also have knowledge of user interface design skills.. This position requires a combination of programming skills and aesthetics (understanding element arrangements on the screen, the color and font choices, and so on). Also, an understanding of the entire web development process, including design, development, and deployment is preferred.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: We have an amazing opportunity for a Full Stack Developer to work with Blackhawk and our clients to help them build their web presence.
